item.title: Using Python's fast data frame library FireDucks
item.description: pandas is a library that provides functions to support data analysis in the Python programming language. NEC Research Laboratories has developed a library called FireDucks, a faster version of pandas. Data Preparation # The analysis is performed on the data of passenger history of cabs in New York City. The source of the data is as follows: https://www.nyc.gov/site/tlc/about/tlc-trip-record-data.page To analyze large data sets, we downloaded and merged the “Yellow Taxi Trip Records” data from January 2022 to June 2023 from the above link.
